title: Repeat skill with key pressed
body:
Can we please have that if you keep the skill key pressed the ability fires again as soon as it's off cooldown?
At least for spells with less than 1,5s of CD and not toggleable?

This would be a huge quality of life change for the likes of {{champion:30}} and {{champion:28}} (and {{champion:120}} and I'm sure I'm missing someone else) ...

replies.body:
Yes please. 
shouldn't have to be spamming Q 2,000 times a match while playing {{champion:28}}

Find a program that can make macros for the keyboard. Assign "Q" to just rapidly press "Q". If you can't find such a program for whatever reason, hook up an Xbox controller and use JoytoKey to make holding a button rapidly do Q.  Considering that's clunky at best, I suggest the first. 

I imagine this whole thing is possible to do within the LoL files, but I don't know how to do it.

But yes, this should be in the option menu by default.

The use of macros violates the terms of service.

EDIT: I'm 95% sure i've read this somewhere in the past, although everything i can find at the moment suggests that it is not bannable.  I still haven't found an official comment, however.
Why would {{champion:421}}  be on this list?

> [{quoted}](name=DarkenedAuras,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vV6oUgY9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-08T18:22:06.790+0000)
>
> Why would {{champion:421}}  be on this list?

Because when I tried her in her free week I remember one skill that needed to be spammed very fast, but checking her wiki page it seems she doesn't have one... so I remembered wrong.
My bad.
Oh, you needed to spam one thing. Your Right Click. Lulz.
This would be enormously useful for {{champion:16}}. Having to reselect my adc always ends up letting me outplay myself because of minion hitboxes overlapping theirs.

Oh my gosh, as someone who plays video games a lot, spamming q as {{champion:28}} legitimately cramps up my hands and makes it hurt really bad, I love Eve but I rarely play her because of this fact (and the fact that she is constantly being nerfed)

RITO PLS. ;-;
